hero.subheader: Base gives startups everything they need to build fast, launch globally, and reach millions of users onchain.

logoStrip.label: Trusted by leading startups and apps

valueProps.header: Build on an open, composable stack
valueProps.subheader: Tap into shared standards for money, identity, social, markets, and chat so you can ship faster, build without gatekeepers, and access the global economy.
Reach millions through the Base App, powered by an open social graph that enables discovery, growth, and virality.
Access grants, programs, and tools that help you build, grow, and earn at every stage.

baseBatches.header: Go from idea, to app, to business on Base
baseBatches.subheader: Base Batches is a 12-week program for founders to turn their ideas into businesses, with access to expert mentorship, resources, and funding opportunities.

baseLayer.header: Meet the builders shaping the global economy

ecosystemPrograms.subheader: Base powers a growing ecosystem of programs designed to help you go from idea to business.

cards.title: Base Builder Rewards
cards.subtitle: The Base ecosystem offers multiple funding pathways designed for builders at every stage, from weekend hacks to full-scale businesses.

cards.title: Base Ecosystem Fund
cards.subtitle: Early stage projects (pre-seed to seed) building on Base can apply for investment.

cards.title: Paymaster Gas Credits
cards.subtitle: Get up to $600 in free Paymaster credits to build gasless onchain apps that make it easy for your users to onboard.

cards.title: Base Services Hub
cards.subtitle: Get exclusive discounts on software and services to help you ship and grow faster.

acceleratorPrograms.subheader: We collaborate with top accelerators and startup programs worldwide to help scale your venture.

cards.title: The R3sidency
cards.subtitle: An accelerator for crypto, AI, and frontier tech founders obsessed with building category-defining companies.

cards.title: Chainlink Build
cards.subtitle: A program that supports both early-stage and established projects by providing enhanced access to Chainlink’s technology, ecosystem, marketing, and technical support.

finalCta.subheader: Ship fast, launch globally, and reach millions of users on Base.
